document_data.name: Summon Nature's Ally II
document_data.mainbody: '''''Summon nature's ally II''''' was one of the series of ''[[summon nature's ally]]'' spells available to [[druid]] and [[ranger]] spellcasters.
document_data.Effects: This spell functioned just like all ''summon nature's ally'' spells, which in turn resembled the ''[[summon monster]]'' spells. It could summon a single [[black bear]], [[crocodile]], [[dire badger]], [[dire bat]], small [[elemental]] of any type, [[hippogriff]], [[shark]], [[viper]], [[squid]], or [[wolverine]]. It could also be used to summon up to three creatures that the ''[[summon nature's ally I]]'' spell could summon.
document_data.Components: The spell required a [[divine focus]] and both [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s.
